channel.title: Wyoming on Sparkfire
channel.description: Recent content in Wyoming on Sparkfire

item.title: Lessons learned on my first high route
item.description: A little about me After joining one of Andrew’s last Backpacking Fundamentals trips in 2015, I decided to put my skills to the test by tackling section 4 of the Wind River High Route. Prior to that I had completed several trips on the Appalachian Trail and on the Florida Trail. The Wind River High Route not only promised adventure but freedom from fixed itineraries, designated campsites and complex permitting schemes.
